question: What statue is located in the central square of Evgenia in Keratsini, Greece?
asked_question_translated: Que estátua se encontra na praça central de Evgenia, em Keratsini, na Grécia?
answer: A praça central de Evgenia, em Keratsini, na Grécia, é conhecida pela estátua do "Estivador".
answer_translated_eng: The centre square of Evgenia, in Keratsini, Greece, is known for its statue of the "Stevedore".
